verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the tribes.<WH7626> From the north<WH6828> end<WH4480> <WH7097> to<WH413> the coast<WH3027> of the way<WH1870> of Hethlon,<WH2855> as one goeth<WH935> to Hamath,<WH2574> Hazar-enan,<WH2704> the border<WH1366> of Damascus<WH1834> northward,<WH6828> to<WH413> the coast<WH3027> of Hamath;<WH2574> for these are<WH1961> his sides<WH6285> east<WH6921> and west;<WH3220> a<WH259> portion for Dan.<WH1835>
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Dan,<WH1835> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> a<WH259> portion for Asher.<WH836>
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Asher,<WH836> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> even unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> a<WH259> portion for Naphtali.<WH5321>
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Naphtali,<WH5321> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> a<WH259> portion for Manasseh.<WH4519>
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Manasseh,<WH4519> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> a<WH259> portion for Ephraim.<WH669>
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Ephraim,<WH669> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> even unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> a<WH259> portion for Reuben.<WH7205>
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Reuben,<WH7205> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> a<WH259> portion for Judah.<WH3063>

And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Judah,<WH3063> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> shall be<WH1961> the offering<WH8641> which<WH834> ye shall offer<WH7311> of five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> reeds in breadth,<WH7341> and in length<WH753> as one<WH259> of the other parts,<WH2506> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side:<WH6285> and the sanctuary<WH4720> shall be<WH1961> in the midst<WH8432> of it.

The oblation<WH8641> that<WH834> ye shall offer<WH7311> unto the LORD<WH3068> shall be of five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> in length,<WH753> and of ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> in breadth.<WH7341>

And for them,<WH428> even for the priests,<WH3548> shall be<WH1961> this holy<WH6944> oblation;<WH8641> toward the north<WH6828> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> in length, and toward the west<WH3220> ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> in breadth,<WH7341> and toward the east<WH6921> ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> in breadth,<WH7341> and toward the south<WH5045> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> in length:<WH753> and the sanctuary<WH4720> of the LORD<WH3068> shall be<WH1961> in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

It shall be for the priests<WH3548> that are sanctified<WH6942> of the sons<WH4480> <WH1121> of Zadok;<WH6659> which<WH834> have kept<WH8104> my charge,<WH4931> which<WH834> went not astray<WH8582> <WH3808> when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went astray,<WH8582> as<WH834> the Levites<WH3881> went astray.<WH8582>
And this oblation<WH8642> of the land<WH776> that is offered<WH4480> <WH8641> shall be<WH1961> unto them a thing most holy<WH6944> <WH6944> by<WH413> the border<WH1366> of the Levites.<WH3881>

And over against<WH5980> the border<WH1366> of the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> shall have five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> in length,<WH753> and ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> in breadth:<WH7341> all<WH3605> the length<WH753> shall be five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand,<WH505> and the breadth<WH7341> ten<WH6235> thousand.<WH505>

And they shall not<WH3808> sell<WH4376> of<WH4480> it, neither<WH3808> exchange,<WH4171> nor<WH3808> alienate<WH5674> the firstfruits<WH7225> of the land:<WH776> for<WH3588> it is holy<WH6944> unto the LORD.<WH3068>

And the five<WH2568> thousand,<WH505> that are left<WH3498> in the breadth<WH7341> over against<WH5921> <WH6440> the five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand,<WH505> shall be a profane<WH2455> place for the city,<WH5892> for dwelling,<WH4186> and for suburbs:<WH4054> and the city<WH5892> shall be<WH1961> in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

And these<WH428> shall be the measures<WH4060> thereof; the north<WH6828> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967> and the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967> and on the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967> and the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>

And the suburbs<WH4054> of the city<WH5892> shall be<WH1961> toward the north<WH6828> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty,<WH2572> and toward the south<WH5045> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty,<WH2572> and toward the east<WH6921> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty,<WH2572> and toward the west<WH3220> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty.<WH2572>

And the residue<WH3498> in length<WH753> over against<WH5980> the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion shall be ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> eastward,<WH6921> and ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> westward:<WH3220> and it shall be<WH1961> over against<WH5980> the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion; and the increase<WH8393> thereof shall be<WH1961> for food<WH3899> unto them that serve<WH5647> the city.<WH5892>
And they that serve<WH5647> the city<WH5892> shall serve<WH5647> it out of all<WH4480> <WH3605> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

All <WH3605> the oblation<WH8641> shall be five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> by five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand:<WH505> ye shall offer<WH7311> <WH853> the holy<WH6944> oblation<WH8641> foursquare,<WH7243> with<WH413> the possession<WH272> of the city.<WH5892>

And the residue<WH3498> shall be for the prince,<WH5387> on the one side<WH4480> <WH2088> and on the other<WH4480> <WH2088> of the holy<WH6944> oblation,<WH8641> and of the possession<WH272> of the city,<WH5892> over against<WH413> <WH6440> the five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> of the oblation<WH8641> toward<WH5704> the east<WH6921> border,<WH1366> and westward<WH3220> over against<WH5921> <WH6440> the five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> toward<WH5921> the west<WH3220> border,<WH1366> over against<WH5980> the portions<WH2506> for the prince:<WH5387> and it shall be<WH1961> the holy<WH6944> oblation;<WH8641> and the sanctuary<WH4720> of the house<WH1004> shall be in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

Moreover from the possession<WH4480> <WH272> of the Levites,<WH3881> and from the possession<WH4480> <WH272> of the city,<WH5892> being in the midst<WH8432> of that which<WH834> is<WH1961> the prince's,<WH5387> between<WH996> the border<WH1366> of Judah<WH3063> and the border<WH1366> of Benjamin,<WH1144> shall be<WH1961> for the prince.<WH5387>
As for the rest<WH3499> of the tribes,<WH7626> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> Benjamin<WH1144> shall have a<WH259> portion.
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Benjamin,<WH1144> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> Simeon<WH8095> shall have a<WH259> portion.
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Simeon,<WH8095> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> Issachar<WH3485> a<WH259> portion.
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Issachar,<WH3485> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> Zebulun<WH2074> a<WH259> portion.
And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Zebulun,<WH2074> from the east<WH6921> side<WH4480> <WH6285> unto<WH5704> the west<WH3220> side,<WH6285> Gad<WH1410> a<WH259> portion.

And by<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Gad,<WH1410> at<WH413> the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward,<WH8486> the border<WH1366> shall be<WH1961> even from Tamar<WH4480> <WH8559> unto the waters<WH4325> of strife<WH4808> in Kadesh,<WH6946> and to the river<WH5158> toward<WH5921> the great<WH1419> sea.<WH3220>

This <WH2063> is the land<WH776> which<WH834> ye shall divide by lot<WH5307> unto the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> for inheritance,<WH4480> <WH5159> and these<WH428> are their portions,<WH4256> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
And these<WH428> are the goings out<WH8444> of the city<WH5892> on the north<WH6828> side,<WH4480> <WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> measures.<WH4060>

And the gates<WH8179> of the city<WH5892> shall be after<WH5921> the names<WH8034> of the tribes<WH7626> of Israel:<WH3478> three<WH7969> gates<WH8179> northward;<WH6828> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Reuben,<WH7205> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Judah,<WH3063> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Levi.<WH3878>

And at<WH413> the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred:<WH3967> and three<WH7969> gates;<WH8179> and one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Joseph,<WH3130> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Benjamin,<WH1144> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Dan.<WH1835>

And at the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> measures:<WH4060> and three<WH7969> gates;<WH8179> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Simeon,<WH8095> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Issachar,<WH3485> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Zebulun.<WH2074>

At the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967> with their three<WH7969> gates;<WH8179> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Gad,<WH1410> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Asher,<WH836> one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Naphtali.<WH5321>
It was round about<WH5439> eighteen<WH8083> <WH6240> thousand<WH505> measures: and the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> from that day<WH4480> <WH3117> shall be, The LORD<WH3068> is there.<WH8033>
